diagrams.title: Prompts vs AI Agents
diagrams.contentSection: Section 5: What Is an AI Agent?

nodes.label: You Type a Prompt
nodes.description: Human types a single question or request

nodes.label: AI Responds
nodes.description: AI gives one text response

nodes.label: You Copy-Paste
nodes.description: User manually takes the text and uses it

nodes.label: You Describe a Goal
nodes.description: Human describes a multi-step objective

nodes.label: Agent Plans
nodes.description: Agent creates a step-by-step plan

nodes.label: Agent Executes
nodes.description: Agent creates files, writes code, runs commands

nodes.label: Working Files on Your PC
nodes.description: Real files created on the user's computer

labels: Two ways to work with AI — and why agents change everything

diagrams.title: The Plan-Execute-Iterate Loop
diagrams.contentSection: Section 5: What Is an AI Agent? — The Plan-Execute-Iterate Loop

nodes.label: You Give a Task
nodes.description: Human describes what they want done

nodes.label: 1. Plan
nodes.description: Agent reads request and creates a step-by-step plan

nodes.label: You Approve?
nodes.description: Human reviews the plan and approves or redirects

nodes.label: 2. Execute
nodes.description: Agent carries out each step: creating files, writing code, running commands

nodes.label: 3. Check
nodes.description: Human reviews the output — is it right?

nodes.label: Task Complete
nodes.description: Task is finished and accepted

labels: How agents work — like delegating to a capable new hire
Agent writes down what it will do
Agent creates files, writes code, runs commands
You review the output. Is it right?

diagrams.title: MCP: Giving Agents New Skills
diagrams.contentSection: Section 9: MCP Tools — Giving Agents Skills

nodes.label: AI Agent
nodes.description: Agent without MCP — limited to reading/writing files

nodes.label: Read/Write Files
nodes.description: The only capability before MCP

nodes.label: No Browser
nodes.description: Cannot access the internet

nodes.label: No Web Data
nodes.description: Cannot pull live data from websites

nodes.label: AI Agent
nodes.description: Agent with MCP — connected to multiple skills

nodes.label: Playwright
nodes.description: Browse any website — pull data from public dashboards

nodes.label: Filesystem
nodes.description: Organize files and folders

nodes.label: Memory
nodes.description: Remember facts between sessions

nodes.label: Fetch
nodes.description: Connect to web services and APIs

labels: Like installing apps on your phone

diagrams.title: GitHub Copilot: Three Modes
diagrams.contentSection: Section 7: Copilot Modes — Chat vs Edit vs Agent

nodes.label: Chat Mode
nodes.description: Sidebar Q&A — ask questions, get text answers

nodes.label: Text in chat panel
nodes.description: Output is text you read and copy

nodes.label: Edit Mode
nodes.description: Select text, ask for targeted changes

nodes.label: File changes directly
nodes.description: Output is direct changes to a file you accept or reject

nodes.label: Agent Mode
nodes.description: Describe a goal, agent plans and builds autonomously

nodes.label: Working files on PC
nodes.description: Output is multiple files created, code written, commands run

labels: Three levels of help — from questions to building
"How do I calculate overtime cost per associate?"
Use when: you need information or ideas
Point at something, ask for changes
"Make this table sort by date instead of name"
Use when: you know exactly what to change
Describe a goal, agent plans and builds
"Build me a dashboard that tracks weekly KPIs"
Use when: you want something BUILT

diagrams.title: Agent Workflow: From Instruction to Output
diagrams.contentSection: Section 8: Exercise 4 + Section 11: Reading Agent Plans & Git Basics

nodes.label: You Give an Instruction
nodes.description: Human describes what they want in plain English

nodes.label: Agent Plans
nodes.description: Agent reads request and creates a step-by-step plan

nodes.label: You Approve?
nodes.description: Human reviews the plan — approve, partial approve, or redirect

nodes.label: Agent Executes
nodes.description: Agent creates files, writes code, runs commands

nodes.label: Agent Checks
nodes.description: Self-healing: agent spots and fixes its own errors

nodes.label: You Review the Output
nodes.description: Human reviews what the agent built — accept, iterate, or undo

nodes.label: Done!
nodes.description: Task complete — working output on your computer

labels: Agent Workflow: From Instruction to Output
You stay in control at every step
Creates files, writes code, runs commands
Self-healing: agent spots and fixes its own errors
Key: You approve every major step — you are always in control

nodes.label: Agent / AI
nodes.description: AI agents and models — blue rectangle

nodes.label: Tool / Action
nodes.description: MCP tools, actions, execution — green rounded rectangle

nodes.label: User / You
nodes.description: Human actors — yellow ellipse

nodes.label: Data / Output
nodes.description: Input/output data — light blue rectangle

nodes.label: Decision
nodes.description: Branch points — cream diamond

nodes.label: Check / Review
nodes.description: Review and evaluation — purple rectangle

nodes.label: Guardrail
nodes.description: Policy constraints — orange rectangle

nodes.label: Error / Blocked
nodes.description: Error states and blocked capabilities — red rectangle
